description: This course introduces basic techniques for performance on a student's choice of three of the following: trumpet, horn, trombone, euphonium, tuba. Additional topics include: pedagogical techniques, tools, and literature; teaching repertoire; and instrument care. Prerequisite: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Brass Methods
prerequisites: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education. Offered annually in the spring semester.
